name: BlockBuster (Games@MQ)
description:
BlockBuster is a linear endless FPS arcade shooter where your goal is to get as far as you can through the procedurally-generated level, and destroy as many enemies as possible, while being under the pressure of a consuming void swallowing the world behind you. The game supports keyboard and mouse as well as gamepad controls, and offers button remapping in the main menu.

Check out the creator's page at https://cfjl-studios.itch.io/blockbuster

Note: created over two semesters at Macquarie University in Games Project A & B (COMP3150/3151).
